arts.sum: St Pauli have all week to plot a massive shock, while Bayern will have to recover from their Champions League meeting with Benfica in midweek. St Pauli are yet to win nor score a goal at home, but h...

arts.ttl: Man United 'reignite interest in key Bayern Munich star and make approach' - as Arsenal also 'shortlist' former Premier League man ahead of potential transfer war
arts.sum: Manchester United have reportedly enquired about a key Bayern Munich star - but could face a showdown with Arsenal for his signature.
Player Ratings Vote ( view results ) Player ratings [ @kicker ]

arts.ttl: Thursday's Transfer Talk Update: Viktor Gyokeres, Leon Goretzka, Julian Alvarez
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. Benfica; Bayern keeping tabs on Sporting CP striker Viktor Gyökeres; Nico Williams to spurn FC Barcelona?; Real Madrid’s Vinicius Jr. to get Saudi mega offer?; and MORE!
arts.sum: Contingency plans are key and it appears that Bayern Munich is looking at Sporting CP striker Viktor Gyökeres as a potential option for Harry Kane’s eventual exit (whenever that might be): Bayern Munich took down Benfica 1-0 in the Champions League in a match that was equally dominant, frustrating, and relieving all at once.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich's 'four-man Harry Kane replacement list' deals blow to Man Utd and Arsenal
arts.sum: Bayern Munich have drawn up a four-man shortlist of strikers who could replace Harry Kane, despite the former Tottenham star still banging in the goals with three years left on his contract

arts.ttl: Man of the Match against Benfica, Jamal Musiala in disbelief at increased number of headed goals for Bayern Munich
arts.sum: Bayern Munich tried and tried to get in behind Benfica’s defense and had a torrid time of doing it until Leroy Sané and Harry Kane worked together to let in Jamal Musiala to head in the winning goal. It has worked well, well enough that it has earned him the Man of the Match award.

arts.ttl: Bavarian Podcast Works — Postgame Show: Bayern Munich 1-0 Benfica (Champions League)
arts.sum: Some initial observations on how Bayern Munich managed to pull out a victory. Bayern Munich pulled out a 1-0 victory over Benfica in the Champions League, but it was not easy.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich reports fan death after medical emergency during Champions League match vs. SL Benfica
arts.sum: FC Bayern’s 1-0 win over Benfica in the league phase of the Champions League on Wednesday night was overshadowed by sad news as a medical emergency in the crowd at the Allianz Arena clouded the game from the start. Around an hour after the game ended, the club received the sad news that the fan had passed away en route to the hospital.

arts.ttl: Report: Bayern Munich loanee Paul Wanner rejects Germany call up after personal call from Julian Nagelsmann
arts.sum: But now Germany head coach Julian Nagelsmann, who gave Wanner his debut at Bayern Munich back in 2022, has reached out to Wanner and offer him a spot in the Germany squad. Wanner wants to continue playing for Germany U21s for now, giving himself more time before making a final decision on his international future
